name: connellyfamily
description: prosopopee problems: inside of the ve directory, there is a themes directory that isn't downloaded for some reason. To deal with this, I had to download the repo and paste themes into the correct directory. Dumb.

scripts.publish: mv build docs && git add . && git commit -am 'good' && git push && mv docs build
scripts.buildAndRun: prosopopee && echo 'Connect to http://penguin.linux.test:9000' && prosopopee preview
scripts.rebuildAndRun: rm -rf build && prosopopee && echo 'Build Folder Deleted and Rebuilt.' && echo 'Connect to http://penguin.linux.test:9000' && prosopopee preview
